name: Dark PoolMining
description: This gives PoolMining a dark theme, helpful for if you want to check on your cryptocurrency mining in the middle of the night. This has a customizable accent color as well.

user.name: Xane Myers (Xane_MM)
user.about: I'm the developer of Magical Mary 1! I've also created userstyles in the past but I haven't updated them in forever. (They might not work as a result.)

additional_info: Added coinfoundry.org to list of websites due to it having a similar appearance.
